author: bsunanda
body: Plan1 operation needs additional channels for 1 RBX but these are grouped into Plan0 channels at LocalReco level. As a result accessing any condition object or geometry for downstream software need to use pre-merged channel information. This affects CaloTower, ParticleFLow, DQM, NoiseFiltering and Skimming. These modifications will not affect non-plan1 operations
title: bsunanda:Run2 hcx112 Codes modified to make Plan1 workflow to run
